title: Van Morrison - OFFICIALLY PURE ! - Montreux 1974 [FLAC]
description:
Van Morrison
Montreux, Switzerland - June 30, 1974

01 - Claude Nobs Intro (1:22)
02 - It's Not The Twilight Zone (6:43)
03 - I Like It Like That (5:18)
04 - Foggy Mountain Top aka T for Texas (5:16)
05 - Bulbs (5:09)
06 - Swiss Cheese aka Buffy Flow (4:38)
07 - Heathrow Shuffle (3:46)
08 - Naked In The Jungle (6:18)
09 - Street Choir (6:51)
10 - Harmonica Boogie aka Pure (instrumental) (11:17) (4:45 is music the rest is clapping)
11 - Since I Fell For You (5:04) (Lenny Welch)
Bonus track:

12 - Into The Mystic (4:04) From Musikladen TV appearance July 10, 1974
13 - Send in the Clowns (3:50) (with Chet Baker)

Total time: 69:41

Complete concert rebuilt from the Montreux 74 DVD lossless (LPCM) soundstream, plus missing parts taken from the bootleg "Pure"

Van Morrison: vocal, acoustic guitar, saxophone, harmonica
Jerome Rimson: bass
Pete Wingfield: keyboards, vocal
Dallas Taylor: drums
